53357.「大変だ！ 姫さまが！ アンルシア姫さまが\n お戻りになられたぞーっ！！:
Everyone! It's the Princess! Anlucia has
returned!!

53358.「……ふふっ。\n どうやら ちゃんと 真の世界に\n 到着できたようですね。:
Hmm hmm... it seems we managed to cross over
into the true world without a hitch.

53359.「はい。この城こそが 私が生まれ育った場所。\n 真のグランゼドーラに 間違いあ:
Yes... this is the castle where I was born and
raised. This is without a doubt the true Gran
Zedora.

53361.「ああ…… 本当に あなたなの？\n よかった……。よく 無事で…………。:
Oh... is it really you...? Thank goodness...
Thank goodness you're all right...

53362.「心配かけて ごめんなさい。\n でも こうして……\n 生きて帰ってくることが:
I'm sorry for worrying you. But because of
that... I was able to come back home alive.

53363.「姫が帰還したとは まことか？: Is it true? Has she returned?

53366.「魔王軍とのいくさで 行方知れずになって以来\n どれほどの体験をなさったのか…:
I can't begin to imagine what you've been
through, ever since you went missing during
the Demon King's attack...

53368.「アリオス王。心して 聞かれるがよい。: Please listen to me very carefully.

53369.「……こちらの アンルシア姫は\n 我らが よく知る かつての姫ではない。:
This Princess Anlucia is not the one we once
knew.

53370.「覚醒を迎え…… 勇者として目覚めた\n 勇者姫アンルシアどのだ。:
She has awakened her true power as a Hero...
The Hero Princess, Anlucia.

53372.「そ… そうか……。\n 天国のトーマも このことを知れば\n さぞや よろこん:
I... I see... I'm sure Toma would have been so
proud to see what you've become...

53374.<center>アンルシア姫が 勇者として\n覚醒を迎えたという報せは\n一夜に:
News of Princess Anlucia's awakening as the
Hero Princess spread throughout the country
in but a single night.

53375.<center>トーマ王子の死と アンルシア姫の消失に\nふさぎ込んでいた人々は:
Depressed by Toma's death and Anlucia's
disappearance, the people heartily celebrated
the Princess's return and awakening as a Hero.

53376.<center>ある者は歌い ある者は踊り\n人々は 大いに騒いで 歓喜に酔いし:
Some sang, some danced... the people were
boisterous and overcome with much joy...

53378.「このたびは 娘が たいへん世話になった。:
You have done much to ensure the safety of
my daughter.

53379.「偽りのレンダーシアなどという世界から\n アンルシアを 無事に連れ戻してくれた:
I simply cannot thank you enough for bringing
her back safely from that false world.
As for what's to come...

53381.「この世界と 似て非なる もうひとつの世界を\n 生みだすとは…… 大魔王マデサ:
To be able to create a false world much like
this one...Madesagora truly is a fearsome
being.

53382.「一見 平和そうに見える この世界にも\n 大魔王の魔の手は 確実に伸びている…:
Things may seem peaceful, but the Demon
Lord is surely playing his hand...and I want
you to find out what he is up to.

53383.「偽りの世界を知る <pc>なら\n 他の者たちが 気づけぬ異変にも\n 気づけ:
Since <pc> knows about the false
world, they should be able to notice things
that we normally cannot.

53384.「どうだ？ <pc>。\n このレンダーシアをめぐり 怪しい現象が\n 起きてお:
Well? Will you investigate any strange
phenomena occuring in the Lendersia of this
world?<yesno><close>

53385.「ふむ。姫の守りに徹したいと言うのか。\n だが アンルシア姫のことは 我らにま:
I see. You want to protect the Princess?
Worry not, she will be in our care. This is
a task only you can accomplish.

53387.「これを そなたに渡しておこう。\n 運命の振り子と呼ばれるものでな。\n 持つ:
I shall give you this. It is called the
Pendulum of Fate. It will lead its bearer to
points of destiny...

53388.「そなたが レンダーシアを旅して\n 出会った事件を解決することは\n 大魔王の:
Righting any wrongs you encounter while in
Lendersia should provide clues to the Demon
Lord's intentions.

53389.「同時にそれは この世界の運命をも変えてゆく。\n 運命が変わった時 振り子はチ:
At the same time, it will change this world's
destiny. When it does, the Pendulum will gain
power, leading to a greater path.

53390.「運命のチカラで満ちれば 振り子は輝きを放つ。\n まずは メルサンディ セレド:
When filled with this power, the Pendulum
will shine. First, head to Melsandy, Celed,
and Al-Ahagiro to investigate their problems.

53394.「ここは 兄の部屋なの……。\n 忙しくて あまり部屋にいない人だったけど\n:
This is my brother's room. He was always busy
and didn't spend much time here, but... it
does bring back memories.

53396.「兄の葬儀には 出席できなかったけど\n 私は 自分の記憶の世界で\n ちゃんと:
I couldn't attend my brother's funeral, but I
did get a chance to say goodbye to him in
the world of my memories.

53397.「今は 私のために生きてくれた 兄の分まで\n しっかり 勇者の使命を 果たさな:
Now I must fulfill the Hero's mission for his
sake! Yes... I must prepare for the coming
battle against the Demon Lord.

53400.「偽りのレンダーシアから 戻る時に使った\n その石は きっと <pc>の\n:
I'm sure that stone will aid you in your
future travels!

53401.「ふむ……。<pc>さんが\n ブレイブストーンを 持つんですか。\n それなら:
Hmmm... you gave the Brave Stone to
<pc>, did you? I suppose I should
explain about it a bit more.

53402.「クロウズさん！\n 今まで どこに行ってたんですか？\n 宴にも出席しないで…:
Claws! Where have you been? You didn't even
partake in the festivities...

53403.「……ふふっ。\n ああいう かしこまった席は 苦手なので\n こっそり抜け出し:
Heh, heh. Formal gatherings really aren't my
thing, so I snuck out and did a little tour
of the castle.

53404.「それより <pc>さん。\n そのブレイブストーンは 勇者が使えばこそ\n 自:
More importantly, though... that Brave Stone
can only be used by the Hero to travel between
the two worlds.

53405.「<pc>さんが使っても\n きっと 何も起こらないと思いますよ。\n ただし…:
I'm sure it will be fine if <pc>
uses it. However...

53406.「このグランゼドーラの 城下町の入り口にもある\n てっぺんに翼を生やした 五角:
You've seen that stone pillar with wings that
stands near the town's entrance? The Pillar of
Courage?

53407.「あまり知られていないことですが\n あれは いにしえの勇者が その地を守るため:
It's a little known fact that those were built
by a past Hero to protect these lands.

53408.「ブレイブストーンを持って その石塔を調べれば\n 勇者のチカラが手助けしてくれ:
If you take the Brave Stone to it, maybe its
power will allow you to unite the true world
with the false one.

53409.「さて……。<pc>さんの 元気な顔も\n 見られましたし 私も この城を出て\:
Well... since <pc>'s face is all
cheerful now, I think I will leave the castle
now to pursue my own goals.

53410.「アンルシア姫を この世界に戻すという\n 大仕事は終わりましたが まだ やるべ:
The great task of bringing Anlucia back to
this world is over, but there is still much
work to be done... I shall see you soon.

53411.「不思議な人ね クロウズさんって……。: What a mysterious man he is...

53412.「……<pc>。この世界の異変を調べて\n 何かわかったら 時々 この城に戻って:
If you find anything out while investigating
what's going on, I'd appreciate if you'd come
back here every so often to keep us posted.

53425.「さあ こうしては おられん！\n すぐに 宴の準備じゃ！ このことを 皆に伝え:
Well, let's not waste another moment! Let us
prepare a great feast, and bring news of the
Princess to everyone!

53429.「その間 <pc>は 私の代わりに\n この世界の異変を 調べてきてほしいの。\:
In the meantime, I need you to go and check
all the unusual things going on right now.
Here, you can have this.

80235.<pc>は 賢者ルシェンダから\n運命の振り子（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<:
<pc> received
the Pendulum of Fate (Key Item) from Sage
Lushenda!<me 60>

80236.「……アンルシア姫は\n 来たるべき 大魔王との戦いに備え\n この城に 留まら:
Anlucia must remain in the castle in
preparation for the coming battle with the
Demon Lord.

80237.「姫とは 別行動になるが\n そなたなら すばらしい成果を見せてくれると\n 期:
You'll both be going your separate ways for
now, but I know you will do just fine!

80238.「<pc>よ。そなたが 旅立つ前に\n 渡しておきたいものがある。この後すぐに\:
<pc>. I have something
I'd like to give you before you go. Please
listen carefully.

82354.「これを あなたに渡しておくわ。\n 直接 私の部屋に来ることができる\n 特別:
I'll give you this, too. It's a special
Zoomstone that'll take you straight to my
room in the castle.

82355.<pc>は\n勇者姫の石を 受け取った！<me 60>:
<pc> received a special Zoomstone
from Anlucia!<me 60>

82356.「ルシェンダさまに 作っていただいたのよ。\n それがあれば 私に会いに来るのも:
Lushenda made this for me. I thought it'd
make it easier for you to come back here
to visit me.

82357.「じゃあ 私は 自分の部屋に戻るわ。\n <pc> 気をつけてね。\n あなたの:
Well, I'm headed back to my room now.
Please take care of yourself, and have a
safe journey!

82669.「ラスカの はしゃぐ声……。\n コペおばあさまの焼いた フワフワのパン……。:
Raska's cheery voice...the fluffy bread
Grandma Kope would bake...

82670.「あっ <pc>。\n もしかして 今の独り言 聞かれちゃった？:
Oh, <pc>!
Did you happen to hear me talking to myself
just now?

82671.「……じつはね。メルサンディ村で\n 暮らしていたときのことを 思いだしていたの:
Actually... I was remembering back to when I
was still living in Melsandy Village.

82672.「偽りの世界のこととはいえ\n あの村で ミシュアとして過ごした時間は\n 何物:
Even though it existed in the false world, the
time I spent there as Mishua is something
that I will always cherish dearly.

82673.「かつての私は トーマ兄さまや……\n 自分の身近な人を 守ることまでしか\n:
I used to think only of protecting Toma and
those closest to me...

82674.「でも メルサンディ村で暮らす中で\n 私には たくさんの 守らなきゃいけない人:
But living in Melsandy Village made me realize
that I have many people that I need to
protect.

82675.「メルサンディ村だけじゃない……。\n 私は この世界で暮らしている\n すべて:
And not just those in Melsandy Village...
I want to protect all the people who live
in this world...

82676.「それが 勇者としての 私の役目だわ。\n 命に代えても 果たすべきことよ。:
That is my duty as the Hero. I'm willing to
give my life for it.

82677.「そのためにも あなたのチカラを\n 私に 貸してほしいの。\n よろしくね <:
And for that... I need you to lend me your
strength, <pc>.
Let's both do our best!

91471.「まさか あれが……？\n あの人が 勇者アルヴァンなの……？:
It can't be... Is that...?
Alvan, the Hero...?

91474.「こんな……。あなたは こんな姿で……。: To see thou...in such a state...

91475.「あなたのことを追ってきました。\n けれど…… ここへ たどり着くまでに\n:
I hath been following you. But...much time
did it take for me to finally arrive hither...

91476.「覚えていますか。\n 私です…… カミルです。:
Does thou remember me?
It's me... Kamil.

91478.「遠い昔 私は 自らを迷宮に封じた\n あなたを救うために この迷宮に入りました:
After thou sealed thyself within this maze
many years ago, I came hither to save thee.

91479.「けれど……迷宮のなかばで 私は息絶えました。\n そして 自分が 何者なのかす:
But...I died whilst wandering this maze.
Becoming but a lost soul, I had forgotten
who I was.

91481.「今代の勇者と盟友よ！\n どうか あなた達の チカラを貸してください。:
O Hero and ally of today!
Please lend me thine strength!

91482.「生者である あなた達の持つ 勇気の輝きは\n 魂のチカラ……。禁忌の術で 汚れ:
The radiant courage that lies within thee, the living...is the power of the soul. Thou should be able to save Alvan's soul, tainted by the
forbidden art.

91764.「ああ アルヴァン……。\n こんな…… こんな姿になって……！\n あなたは:
Oh, Alvan...
To see thee...in such a state...!
Thou art so selfish!

91765.「あなたは 私の身代わりになるつもりで\n 魔王討伐への出立の日……\n 私の竜:
The day we set out to defeat the Demon King,
you broke mine flute and left...
Did thou intend to go in mine place?

91766.「不死の魔王を異世界に封じる\n 禁忌の術を 私に使わせないために……。:
To stop me from using the forbidden art of
sealing to seal the Immortal Demon King
in another world...

91768.「君は…… 盟友としての使命に燃えていた……。\n 命を捨てて……禁術を使うこと:
Thou...were so focused on thy duty of being mine ally...that thou were willing to sacrifice thine own life...even using the
forbidden art... But...

91769.「僕には それが受け入れられなかった……。\n 君を守るためなら……\n 命だっ:
I could not accept that... I believed that if
it meant protecting thee, I would hesitate
not to give up mine own life...

91771.「本当に 何もわかっていません。\n 私は 盟友の使命だと思って\n 命を捨てる:
Thou truly does not understand anything.
I did not sacrifice mineself believing it was
my duty as your ally.

91772.「私だって……\n あなたの為なら 命は惜しくなかったのです。: I...would have given mine life for thee, too.

91773.「そうか。それなら僕は……: I see. If that is so, then I...

91775.<center>あの子たちは…… そうか。\n今代の 勇者と盟友なんだね。:
Those children... I see.
Thou art the Hero and ally of this time.

91776.<center>……ええ。あの子たちも また\n誰かと出会い…… 誰かと別れ……:
...Yes. Those children shall also meet with
someone... part with someone...
and weave new stories together.

91777.<center>私たちは 見守りましょう。\n新しい時代の物語を。:
We shall watch over thee. To see the story of
a new era...

91778.<center>……ありがとう。\n今代の勇者と 盟友よ……。:
O Hero and ally of this time...
Thank you...
